snippet: A United States attorney known for taking on corruption is resigning amid revelations that senior prosecutors in his office had been anonymously commenting online about active cases.
abstract: Jim Letten, chief federal prosecutor in New Orleans and longest-serving United States attorney in nation, is resigning amid revelations that senior prosecutors in his office had been anonymously commenting online about active cases; he is known for taking on corruption.
lead_paragraph: A United States attorney known for taking on corruption is resigning amid revelations that senior prosecutors in his office had been anonymously commenting online about active cases.

headline.seo: Jim Letten, New Orleans U.S. Attorney, Resigns
headline.main: Crusading New Orleans Prosecutor to Quit, Facing Staff Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Crusading New Orleans Prosecutor To Quit, Facing Staff Misconduct
